title: Video of Tribal Girl Beaten by Kin in MP Given Communal Twist
subtitle: Tribal Girl Beaten in Madhya Pradesh Viral Video: Video in which a girl is being brutally thrashed by a group of men is being circulated on social media with a claim that a Hindu women is being beaten by Muslim men.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The narrative with which the video is being shared is completely false. The incident took place in Madhya Pradesh’s Dhar, where a 21-year-old tribal woman was assaulted by her family members for being allegedly involved with a Dalit man.

The incident was reported to the police, following which four of the seven accused were arrested.
